loans.use: to buy more stocks to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, soap and toiletries, snack foods, and rice.

loans.name: Guisselle

texts.en: Guisselle, the breadwinner in her family, is making a profit through her sari-sari (general store) store business. She is 36 years old and married. She rented a space in the public market and never gets tired of tending her store. Her passion is selling, and she earns a meager income from it that is sufficient to support her family. Guisselle is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing, without records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventory and sales. Guisselle continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she is a persevering mother who has the determination to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventory and sales

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en: Merlita earns a living offering manicure/pedicure, haircuts and other services in her small parlor. She is 59 years old, married and lives in Southern Poblacion, Plaridel. She is now well known for the nice quality of services she offers. She has already purchased some new manicure sets and was able to save from it. Her services are self-sustainable and have become profitable, with a net profit of about PHP 3,000 per month. Merlita is seeking a PHP 12,000 loan. She would like to use the loan to purchase special items for foot spa services. This is a regular loan, and would be repaid in a few months. In her two previous loans, she has never had a delinquency. Merlita is very diligent and loves accuracy, which only adds to the effective management of her venture.

loans.use: to purchase special items for foot spa services

loans.name: Priscar

texts.en:
Priscar is married and has five children, three of whom attend school and two are still too young for school. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past two years, she has owned a food stall business, where neighbours and town dwellers. She faces a major challenge of competition in her business.

With the Kshs 50,000, she wants to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour and cooking fat oil. She dreams of expanding to a modern cafe business.

loans.use: to purchase stock of goods like sugar, rice, maize and wheat flour and cooking fat oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her upcoming semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family

loans.name: Prado Group

texts.en:
Neema, who is in her mid 30s, is single with one son who is still small. She has been running a beauty salon for one year now. She works from 8:30 a.m. to 9:30 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be Neema's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to buy up-to-date salon products and meet her customers' requests. She dreams of opening a retail shop.

Neema will share this loan with her loan group, "Prado," which consists of three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date salon products and meet her customers' requests.

loans.name: Munisa

texts.en:
Munisa was born in 1976. She is married and has three children. She lives with her family in the north part of Tajikistan. Munisa has been busy with her own business deal for more than three years. She has a store where she sells hamburgers, chocolates, cookies, drinks, etc. Her store is located in the center of her town, and that’s why she has many customers. 

Munisa always tries to increase working capital, and in this way, improve business. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 Somoni to buy equipment for making popcorn. She awaits your mercy and in advance thanks you for your mercy.

loans.use: to buy equipment for making popcorn

loans.name: Nhóm 02 Thôn Hậu Áng Xã Công Liêm Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Anh has a service business providing karaoke services. She is requesting a loan to purchase equipment to maintain the store that provides the karaoke service. Anh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Anh is 41 years old, and she is married with two children. In 2000, Anh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Anh has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Anh is the group leader of the Nhóm 02 Thôn Hậu Áng xã Công Liêm solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

With her business profit, Anh hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to do well in school, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase equipment to maintain the store that provides karaoke service.

loans.name: Nhóm 05 Hòa Phú Hòa Lộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Vân operates a food stall/restaurant selling seafood. Vân has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase seafood to resell. This is Vân's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Vân is 40 years old, and she is married with three children. She is the leader of a four-member group, the Nhóm 05 Hòa Phú Hòa Lộc solidarity group. 

With her business profit, Vân hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase seafood to resell.

loans.name: Amancia

texts.es:
La señora Amancia esta casada y es madre, Siempre quiso ser una Universitaria pero por falta de recursos económicos no pudo seguir estudiando, después de mucho tiempo, vio la necesidad de culminar sus estudios por la necesidad de ser alguien y para servir a la sociedad.
Ella esta estudiando la carrera de ciencias en la educación, para poder ayudar a las otras personas que al igual que ella quieran estudiar.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en los gastos e su tesis, y lo cual le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sra. Amancia is married and a mother. She had always wanted to become a university student, but she lacked the financial resources to continue her studies. After a long time had passed, she saw the need to finish her studies because she wanted to make something of herself and be able to serve society.

Amancia is studying for a degree in Educational Sciences so that she can assist others like her who want to study. She is requesting this loan so that she can invest in the expenses for her thesis, which will be of great help.

loans.use: to pay her thesis expenses.

loans.name: Benedtta

texts.en:
Benedtta does farming in Tala town and has been in the business for five years. She is 42 years old, married, and together with her spouse, she has been blessed with five children. 

She plans to use this loan to buy seeds and fertilizer. This will enable her to get more farm produce for selling. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business. 

This is her second loan term from VisionFund Kenya, and she paid her previous loan successfully. Her future hopes are to grow her business and live a better life with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Myrna

texts.en:
Myrna is 45 years old and married with five children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Myrna is borrowing 15,000 PHP from NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. Myrna has been raising pigs for ten years and also earns additional income from frozen foods.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business and to repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Nhóm 11 Lạch Trường, Hải Lộc Group

texts.en:
Hằng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fruit. Hằng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables and fruits to resell. 

Hằng is 38 years old and is married with two children. Hằng is the group leader of the Nhóm 11 Lạch Trường, Hải Lộc Group, which consists of three members. In 2012, Hằng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hằng has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Hằng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables and fruits to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 5 Hòa Hải Hòa Lộc Group

texts.en:
Gái operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell. Gái has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

Gái is 36 years old and is married with four children. Gái is the group leader of the Nhóm 5 Hòa Hải Hòa Lộc Group, which consists of four members. In 2013, Gái joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Gái has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Gái hopes for her children to do well in school, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase fish to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 01 - Thôn 8 - Thọ Vực Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lượng works in agriculture, raising pigs. Lượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In 2013, Lượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Lượng has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Lượng is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 - Thôn 8 - Thọ Vực solidarity group, which consists of four members. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

Lượng is 37 years old, and she is married with four children. With her business profit, Lượng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase baby pigs to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at her home to improve access to water and sanitation for her family.

loans.name: Florinda

texts.en:
Florinda is a hard-working entrepreneur who has a rice retailing business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy more stocks of rice to sell to customers.

Florinda successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

NWTF is listing Florinda's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Fausto

texts.es:
Fausto es de la ciudad de concepción, esta estudiando la tecnicatura en enfermería, lo que le permitirá seguir luchando por un futuro mejor.
Comenta que su sueño es poder ayudar a las demás personas y a su familia por medio de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera, lo que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Fausto is from the city of Concepción. He is studying for a degree in Nursing, which will allow him to continue striving for a better future. Fausto says that his dream is to help other people and his family through his studies.

He is requesting this loan so that he can pay for his degree fees, which will be of great help.

loans.use: to pay his degree fees.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.en:
Sitora was born in 1995. She is not married and lives with her parents. Sitora lives and studies at the capital of Tajikistan. She studies at the National University of Tajikistan. She studies at the faculty of economy and finance. Sitora studies in absentia. She also works in Imon International. 

Sitora is a very hardworking and smart woman. She is asking for a loan to pay for her university tuition. She awaits your mercy and in advance thanks you for your generosity.

loans.use: to pay for tuition

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help bring a new winter clothing collection from other districts that are far from where she lives.

loans.name: Anthony

texts.en:
Anthony is a strong-willed man who pushes his ability when it comes to his piggery business. He is a hands-on businessman and father who never gets tired of working so hard to support his family. 

Recently, Anthony requested a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for his growing hogs in order to boost his income. 

Aside from his project of building additional pigpens, he has thought of adding heads of swine for business expansion and plans to take on cattle production for additional income. Someday, Anthony hopes to open a meat shop in a nearby town.

loans.use: to purchase bags of of feed and animal vitamins for his growing hogs in order to boost his income

loans.name: Nhóm 06 Mỹ Điền Đa Lộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thùy has a retail business selling medication. She is requesting a loan to purchase medicine to resell.

Thùy is 31 years old, and she is married with two children.
She is the leader of a four member group, the Nhóm 06 Mỹ Điền Đa Lộc solidarity group. 

In 2013, Thùy joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Thùy has successfully repaid two loans from the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Thùy has been involved in this business for five years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Thùy hopes to build a new house, to buy a motorbike, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase medicine to resell

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en: Esterlita has always had enthusiasm for managing her farming activities, from which she earns a meager income. Her farming helps her husband in support of their family. At the age of 62, she busies herself to sufficiently provide for the family, most especially for her children's education. She never stopped pursuing her goals for the benefit of the family. She grabbed the opportunity to become a full-fledged member of PMPC. She credits the cooperative for her capital in supporting her farming activities. Recently, she applied for a loan to pay for labor costs for her farm where she grows root crops and corn. In the future, Esterlita wishes to own a hauling truck for easy transport of her produce to any marketplace in the province.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Idoyat

texts.en: Idoyat comes from Tajikistan. She is widowed and has three children. Idoyat works hard every day to earn a living. Idoyat has been busy with baking and selling flatbreads. She sells flatbreads in a local market where she has regular customers. Idoyat’s son helps her with managing the business. Idoyat is going to increase her working capital and improve her business. She is asking for a loan of 7,500 TJS to buy coal and flour for baking more flatbreads. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy coal and flour for baking more flatbreads

loans.name: Jessica Paola

texts.es:
Jessica Paola tiene 35 años de eddad, es madre soltera. Reside en casa propia junto a su hija, ella es natural de la zona. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila ya que su actividad es la agricultura, ganadería, comercio y transporte. Dicha comunidad está ubicada en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón, región de Piura, costa norte de Perú.

Jessica Paola es a la venta de ropa en su domicilio y en los alrededores de su comunidad, Jessica Paola cuenta con clientela fija en la zona y con experiencia en el negocio. Además cuenta también con buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El destino del crédito será para la compra de ropa ya que cuenta con pedidos por las fiestas patronales en Morropon, además también desea aumentar y diversificar su stock de productos por las fiestas navideñas ya muy próximas. Lo que le permitirá en un corto plazo mejorar sus ingresos, aumentar sus ganancias y por ende mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jessica Paola is a 35-year-old single mother. She resides in her own home along with her daughter. Jessica is a native of the area. Life in her community is peaceful and the main business activities are agriculture, livestock breeding, trade, and transportation. This area is located in the District of Buenos Aires in Morropón Province, which is in the region of Piura on the northern coast of Peru.

Jessica Paola sells clothing from her home and in the surrounding neighborhoods of her community. She has an established clientele in the area and experience in this type of business. In addition, Jessica has good personal and work-related references in the area. This loan will be used to buy clothing since she already has orders for the patron saint festivals in Morropón. She also wants to increase and diversify her inventory of products for the upcoming Christmas parties. In the short term, Jessica will be able to increase her earnings, improve her income, and eventually improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to increase and diversify her inventory of products in time for the patron saint festivals and the Christmas season.

loans.name: La Victoria Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado La Victoria está en su segundo ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, también forman parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Juana, ella  se dedica a la venta de ropas , en su última encuesta se encontraba mejorando su estilo de vida, todo esto gracias a su trabajo y a las constantes capacitaciones.
Juana pide este préstamo para poder surtirse con mas variedad de prendas, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
This is the "La Victoria" group, which is on its second loan cycle as part of the women's committee and the poverty elimination programmes.

One member of the group is Juana, who makes a living selling clothes. At her last poverty survey, she was found to be improving her lifestyle, all thanks to her work and constant training.

Juana is applying for this loan in order to stock up her business with a variety of clothing items. With this she can continue to make sales.

loans.use: to buy various items of clothing to sell.

loans.name: Las Rosas De San Antonio Group

texts.es:
La Rosa de San Antonio  esta en su Primer ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres, también esta dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, es un grupo nuevo que lucha por poder crecer e ir mejorando cada día.
Una de ellas es la señora Ancelmina , quien es una persona muy luchadora, que se esfuerza por su familia para poder darles un mejor estilo de vida. Ella vende ropa interior y así poco a poco esta luchando por abrirse camino.
Hoy pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas interiores para poder seguir con su venta.
texts.en:
The "Rosa de San Antonio" group is on its first loan cycle as part of the women's committee programme. The members are also part of the poverty elimination programme. This is a new group where the members are fighting in order to grow and improve their lives every day.

One member of the group is Ancelmina, a plucky woman who works hard to give her family a better lifestyle. Ancelmina sells underwear and is gradually fighting to open up a path for herself.

Today Ancelmina is applying for a loan in order to buy underwear to continue making sales.

loans.use: to buy underwear to sell.

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
El grupo Las Mercedes está en su ciclo número 7 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde todas ellas se encuentran están por debajo de la línea de la pobreza.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Amelia quien es modista, una persona muy trabajadora, que se fue abriendo camino gracias a su esfuerzo y lucha diaria, y comenta que se ha formado ya muy buena clientela que siempre le lleva muchos trabajos.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de Tela, Hilo y Agujas, y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The "Las Mercedes" group is on its seventh loan cycle as part of the women's committee programme. Everybody works hard and helps each other to get ahead. The group members are undergoing the poverty elimination survey, and each woman has found that she is living under the poverty line.

One member of the "Las Mercedes" group is Amelia, a dressmaker. Amelia is very hard-working and has made this her work and path in life through her daily efforts. Amelia says that she now has a good customer base that brings her a lot of work.

Amelia is applying for this loan in order to buy material, thread, needles and other items that will help her to produce and sell more; this will help Amelia to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy material, thread, needles and more.

loans.name: Mirtha

texts.es:
Mirtha tiene 22 años, está casada, tiene un hijo. Comenta que ella es la mayor de tres hermanos, de aquí a unos años se ve con un trabajo seguro y capaz estudiando otra carrera.
Hoy estudia la carrera de enfermería, y comenta que su objetivo es poder progresar en la vida a través del estudio para poder darle una vida digna a su hijo quien es su inspiración.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Mirtha is 22 years old, married, and has one child. She says that she is the oldest of three siblings. A few years ago, she figured out that in order to have a secure job she needed to study for another career.

Today she is studying for a degree in Nursing. Mirtha says that her goal is to make progress in life through her studies. She wants to provide a decent life for her son, who is her inspiration.

Mirtha is requesting this loan so that she can pay her degree fees. This will allow her to continue with her studies.

loans.use: to pay her university fees.

loans.name: Shahin

texts.en:
Shahin is 34 years old and is married with four children. His wife is a housewife and she educates their children. He has a big and happy family. Shahin always helps his children with their studies. His eldest son and twin daughters are 13 years old and in grade 7, while his younger son is 11 years old and in grade 5. The family are Internally Displaced Persons from Fuzuli city and now live in the Absheron region of Azerbaijan. 
Shahin is a taxi driver who transports passengers between various areas of Absheron. Today he needs a loan of 1,300 Azerbaijan New Manat (AZN) and has applied to Komak Credit Union. With this loan, he wants to repair his car's motor. Shahin is thankful to Kiva and its lenders for their help.

loans.use: to repair his taxi

loans.name: Pelagia

texts.en: Pelagia is driven by her passion for her work. She is a 54-year-old separated mother living in Lopez Jaena in the Philippines. As her family's bread winner, Pelagia patiently works in her store every day to provide for her family's basic necessities. She wants to expand her business and so recently became a member of Paglaum MPC to access insurance and financial assistance. Now, she has taken out a loan of 10,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to pay for an inventory of assorted goods to sell, which will improve her income. In the future, Pelagia dreams of sustaining her store to keep providing for her needs and those of the whole family.

loans.use: to buy assorted goods for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet is a married woman with one child who is still too young to attend school. Her house has neither electricity nor piped water.

Juliet has operated a retail shop for the past four years, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour and sugar. The major challenge her business faces is a lack of capital.

With this loan of 74,700 Kenyan shillings (KES), Juliet wants to buy stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour

loans.name: Timbovimbanaye Group

texts.en:
Everlasting Joy is a member of Tinovimbanaye group. The group is based in Kuwadzana in Harare. She is 37 years old and married with three children. Everlasting Joy is a haberdasher. She specializes in selling small clothing accessories such as ribbons, buttons, cotton laces, thread, zips and also other small items like watch batteries. She operates at a market stall at their local shops. She has been in the business for 9 years. 

Challenges she faces in her business include competition from others and difficulties of working in an open space during the rainy season or during very hot summer days. Her business has helped her complement her husband’s income. He is a vendor. She is able to feed, clothe and educate her children. Everlasting Joy plans to buy more products for her stall, make her stall rain and sun proof and she dreams of being a big wholesaler someday. She also has future plans of working from the central business district in Harare, and not in the townships as there is a bigger market there.

loans.use: To expand her haberdashery business.

loans.name: Benita

texts.en:
Benita is happy tending her little store. She is married with four children and the store is her means of earning a living to support her family. Fortunately, her store is in a populous neighborhood and so she makes good daily sales. Benita keeps on running the store well, even though there is increased competition from other stores. She believes that with PMPC's support, she and her family will keep going and beat the competition. 
Benita has reached her 11th year being a member of Paglaum MPC. She has applied for a loan of 20,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to restock her store. Expanding her inventory will mean additional income. She has confidence that she can continue to be a member in good standing. She is a hard-working mother and wishes to sustain the store and from there, provide her family with good living conditions.

loans.use: to restock her store

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
Este es un nuevo grupo que se formo para que las integrantes puedan ir mejorando por medio de su trabajo unido. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza como un medio de ayuda para ellas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. María, quien en su encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir un nivel medio. A través del esfuerzo y dedicación continua y por medio de la venta de empanadas que hace está mejorando poco a poco. Pide este préstamo para poder comprar más productos, como ser: harina, aceite, verduras, carne, etc., también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones.
texts.en: This is a new group that was created so that its members could improve through their united effort. They are doing the poverty elimination test as a way to help themselves. One of the members is Madam Maria, who in her test showed a poverty level within level 2, that is to say medium level. Through her effort and continued dedication and through the sales of the empanadas (pies) she makes, she is improving step by step. She requests a loan to be able to buy more products, like: flour, oil, vegetables, meat etc. The work of the advisors should also be highlighted, who do a permanent follow up of trainings and verifications.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, vegetables, meat etc.

loans.name: San Expedito Group

texts.es:
San Expedito se formo con la unión de varias vecinas y amigas de la ciudad de Itá, están en su primer ciclo del programa de comité de mujeres.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Felicita, ella es casada y tiene 4 hijos, tiene un pequeño kiosco donde vende comidas rápidas, bebidas y golosinas, ella a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo constante está saliendo adelante y también con la ayuda de su comité aprendiendo los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer las comidas rápidas que vende. Todas Agradecen por la oportunidad que reciben de poder mejorar sus vidas.
texts.en:
The Expedito is made up of a group of various neighbors and friends in the city of Itá. They are in their first cycle of the women’s program committee.

One of the members is Felicita. She is married and has four children. She has a small kiosk where she sells fast food, drinks and sweets. She is getting ahead through effort and constant work and with the help of her committee she is learning the vital behaviors of a successful woman.

She is asking for this loan to invest in the purchase of supplies so she can make the fast food she sells. 

All of them are grateful for the opportunity that they receive to improve their lives.

loans.use: to buy supplies in order to make fast food to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Kuña Guapa 2 está formado por  17  integrantes, están  el 6to.  ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante .
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Angelica  quien a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y por medio de la venta de quesos que hace tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora. 
La Sra. Angelica Solicita este préstamo para poder comprar queso en cantidad, y de esa forma seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: The group Kuña Guapa 2 consists of 17 members. They are in the sixth cycle of the women's committee program, where all of them work and help each other to get ahead. One of the members is Madam Angelica, who, through her effort and continued work and through the sales of the cheeses she makes, has the resources to be able to help her family. She is a hardworking and entrepreneurial person. Madam Angelica requests this loan to be able to buy cheese in quantities and this way continue with her sales as she has done before.

loans.use: to buy cheese to sell

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado  San Antonio está formado por  18 integrantes ,están  el primer ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan las unas a las otras.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ramona quien en la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza que se le practicó esta en el nivel 2, es decir en un nivel medio. Ella es comerciante, tiene una despensa, y pide este préstamo para poder comprar insumos varios para poder seguir con sus ventas. Agradece por esta oportunidad que recibe para poder seguir creciendo.
texts.en: The group called San Antonio consists of 18 members. They are in the first cycle of the women's committee program, where all work and they help each other. One of the members is Madam Ramona, who in the poverty elimination test that she underwent is in level 2, that is to say in a medium level. She is a merchant, she has a store and requests this loan to be able to buy various supplies to be able to continue her sales. She is grateful for this opportunity that she got to be able to continue growing.

loans.use: to buy supplies to stock her store

loans.name: Oñondivepa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Oñondivepa está dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde todas están poniendo todo de si para poder mejorar sus vidas. 
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Clara, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha ido mejorando a través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo. Entre el trabajo que ella hace cuenta que se dedica a la Artesanía, pues ella es alfarera.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de moldes varios y arcilla para poder seguir con su trabajo en la alfarería, y de esa forma poder seguir con su trabajo. Todas están agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder crecer y mejorar.
texts.en:
The Oñondivepa Group is part of the “Poverty Stoplight” program, where all of them are putting everything into improving their lives.

One of the members is Clara, who in her latest survey showed a poverty level of three, that is to say that she has been improving through effort and continuous work. She dedicates herself to the work of handicrafts as she is a potter.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy various molds and clay in order to be able to continue her pottery work so she can go on working.

All of them are grateful for the opportunity they are receiving to grow and improve.

loans.use: to buy molds and clay to use in her handicraft work as a potter.

loans.name: Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Katupyry” es un comité de 19 mujeres que están muy bien consolidadas, trabajan y se ayudan mutuamente. Estas señoras son de la ciudad de Villarrica, todas son vecinas.
Estas señoras están muy animadas de seguir participando en este programa de microcrédito, entre ellas se destaca la Sra. Lourdes, quien es la presidenta de este comité, ella tiene una despensa muy bien surtida con todo tipo de productos, y por medio de este negocio obtiene los medios suficientes para poder ayudar a su familia y demás seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder surtirse con todo tipo de productos, como ser verduras, bebidas, panificados, embutidos y demás, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: The group 'Katupyry' is a committee of 19 women who are very well consolidated, who work and help each other mutually. These ladies are from the city Villarrica and are all neighbours. These ladies are very excited to continue participating in this microcredit program. Between them, stands Madam Lourdes, who is the president of this committee. She has a very well stocked store with all kinds of products and through this business she obtains sufficient resources to be able to help her family and other loved ones. She requests this loan to be able to stock up on all kinds of products, like vegetables, drinks, baked goods, sausages and more, so that she can continue with her sales like she did before.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, drinks, baked goods, sausages and more

loans.name: Eleno

texts.es:
Eleno es un joven luchador, que por medio de sus ventas diarias ha ido creciendo y mejorando cada día, comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior ha podido comprar mayores insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas como lo vino haciendo.
Comenta que le ha sido de mucha ayuda su préstamo anterior.
Hoy pide un nuevo préstamo para poder comprar hamacas, frazadas y sábanas para continuar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Eleno is a young fighter who through his daily sales has been has been growing and improving every day. He comments that through his previous loan he has been able to buy more supplies so he can continue his sales, as he has been doing. He says that the previous loan was very helpful.

Today he is asking for a new loan in order to buy hammocks, blankets, and bed sheets, to continue his sales.

loans.use: to buy hammocks, blankets, and bed sheets

loans.name: Ikatu Group

texts.es:
El grupo Ikatu  de comité de mujeres que se encuentran en el primer ciclo, el nombre de este grupo quiere decir “Se puede”, ya que todas están conscientes de que por medio del trabajo unido se puede crecer y salir adelante.
Laura, quien integra este grupo, se dedica a las ventas en un copetín y también a la venta de prendas varias. Ella es una mujer muy luchadora y por sobre todo muy trabajadora, que lucha por un mejor porvenir, no solo para ella, sino también para su familia.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas varias para la venta, de manera a cumplir con el pedido de sus clientes como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en: The group Ikatu is a women's committee that is in the first cycle. The name of this group means 'we can', as all are aware that through a united effort, they can grow and get ahead. Laura, who is a member of this group, makes a living of the sales in a small restaurant and also of the sales of various garments. She is a woman who is a fighter and above all very hardworking, who fights for a better future, not just for her, but also for her family. She requests this loan to be able to invest it in the buying of various garments to sell, so that she can comply with the requests of her clients, as she did before.

loans.use: to buy various garments to sell

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en:
Rosana, aged 38, is a married woman with seven children, six of whom currently attend school. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Rosana has had a food vending business in the Philippines for four years. 

She has requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients to produce food to sell in her business. In the future, Rosana would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to produce food to sell

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria es de la ciudad de San Ignacio, cuenta con una despensa bien surtida en su casa, con años de antigüedad en este negocio, por lo que ya tiene muy buena clientela, su marido también la ayuda pero se dedica a la ganadería, de esta forma ambos se ayudan por el bienestar de la familia.
Tienen una hija que está estudiando en la facultad, todo gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres. Son una familia humilde y trabajadora.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos varios para su despensa, como frutas, verduras, carne, panificados y demás, que le permitirá seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Maria is from the city of San Ignacio. She has a well-stocked pantry in her home and has years of service in this business which is why she has very good customers. Her husband also helps her but is dedicated to livestock. This is the way they work together for the wellbeing of the family.

They have a daughter who is studying at university, thanks to the effort of her parents. They are a humble and hardworking family.

Maria is asking for this loan in order to buy various supplies for her pantry, such as fruit, vegetables, meat, bread, and more so that she can continue working as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her pantry such as: fruit, vegetables, meat, bread, and more

loans.name: Melanie Estrella

texts.en:
Melanie Estrella, aged 42, is married and has four children. She is from Concepcion, Iloilo. Melanie Estrella has been engaged in a fishing business with her husband for more than three years. This is the source of their income. 

Melanie Estrella is requesting a loan to buy new fishing nets. This loan will allow her to improve their fishing business as well as their income. In the future, Melanie Estrella hopes to make their business sustainable and productive. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets

loans.name: Yehya

texts.en:
Yehya, aged 21, is a single man who is a Palestinian refugee. He lives in a Palestinian refugee camp. Due to the poor financial and social situations of Palestinian refugees, especially those who live in camps, six years ago, Yehya was forced  to leave school at an early age. He started working as a barber to help in covering the needs and expenses of his family.

Today, Yehya is acquiring a youth loan to buy the necessary hair tools to develop his business, so he can decorate his shop. This loan is very important to Yehya as it will help him to increase his income and improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy the necessary hair tools for his barber shop

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es: Esta humilde y sonriente mujer de 43 años de edad bautizada con el nombre de Maria es una confeccionista a terceros que trabaja diariamente para alcanzar un objetivo hacer crecer su empresa, para emplear personas, es una mujer con buen volumen de trabajo pero sus conocimientos básicos en administración hace  que no se vea su dinero, con el apoyo de interactuar esta mujer lograra gestionar mejor su empresa y le facilitara una suma para comprar insumos para la confección de prendas íntimas y camisetas, por lo que está muy motivada al saber que su empresa va a mejorar y tendrá la oportunidad de ofrecer empleo a una o dos madres cabeza de familia cercanas que necesitan de los ingresos para alimentar a sus niños y cubrí las necesidades más básicas.
texts.en:
This humble and smiling 43 year old woman is named Maria. 

She is a clothing manufacturer to third parties who works daily to achieve her goal of growing her business so she can employ people. 

She is a woman with a good workload but was lacking in basic administration money skills. With the support of Interactuar she is successfully improving her business and raising capital in order to buy supplies to make underwear and shirts. 

This is why she is very motivated to know that her business is going to improve and she will have the opportunity of offering employment to one or two nearby mothers who are heads of household and need the income to feed their children and cover the most basic necessities.

loans.use: to buy supplies in order to make underwear garments and shirts in order to improve her quality of life

loans.name: Haroon Iqbal

texts.en:
Haroon is 53 years old and the father of four children. He is a hard-working and fair person. For his business, Haroon owns a computer shop in Karachi for buying and selling computer products/accessories. He has gained good experience in this business. Haroon feels it’s the right time to invest more to make his business more profitable given the increasing demand for computers. Most of his customers are students who buy the computers for personal use.

Haroon wants to start saving money for his children’s marriages. He has therefore requested a loan to arrange for financing to buy computers and accessories to sell. This will develop his business and increase his sales. Haroon is hopeful for his business and thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for their ready assistance.

loans.use: to buy computers and accessories to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and build a bathroom, septic tank, and closet at their home to improve access to water and sanitation for their family

loans.name: Paulo

texts.en:
Paulo, who is in his early 30s, is single with five children. Four of them are at school and the fifth one is still small.  

He has been selling home utensils for five years now. He works from 8 a.m. to 9 p.m. daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Paulo's ninth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to keep on increasing the utensils stock and has paid back all his loans successfully. He is happy with the loans and appreciates Kiva for its support. 	

He used the profit to pay school fees, build two small houses and cover household expenses. He will use this loan to increase his home utensils stock.  He dreams of owning a big retail shop. 

Paulo will make sure he pays back his loan successfully.

loans.use: to increase his home utensils stock.

loans.name: Sarfaraz
loans.use: to purchase clothing for his shop.

loans.name: Muhammad Danish

texts.en:
Danish, 35, is married and father of two children. He owns a sweets shop. He is a hardworking and honest person.

Due to increase in business, Danish wants to purchase sweets items for his shop to attract more customers and grow his business. Due to insufficient financing, he has requested a loan to purchase the sweets.

This loan will help him boost his business and increase his market outreach. He is thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to purchase sweets items for his shop.

loans.name: 020405040003 Nông Nghiệp _ Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Hiền is 36 years old and she is married and has two children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a  rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Hiền is the group leader of the 020405040003 Nông Nghiệp _ Hoằng trường solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

In 2012, Hiền joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Hiền has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Hiền has a retail business selling fruits and vegetables. Hiền has been involved in this business for six years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fruits and vegetables to resell.

With her business profit, Hiền hopes to make enough money to provide for her children, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Juniolita

texts.en:
Juniolita is a 54-year-old married woman and a mother of two children from Concepcion, Iloilo. 

She is engaged in selling rice to the people in her place. Juniolita has sold rice for more than a year now. Her husband is a fish vendor.

Juniolita is asking for a loan to buy more rice to sell. With this, she will be able to improve her rice stocks, thus allowing her to cater to more buyers in her store. In the future, Juniolita hopes to make her business more sustainable and productive. Moreover, she wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more rice to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to help her cover her semester fees.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair the cow stall.

loans.name: Milton

texts.es:
Milton es un sonriente y alegre trabajar que administra un deposito el cual heredo de su familia, por ende en su juventud y niñez iba mucho con su papa y aprendió todo de este negocio.
Milton ya es todo un hombre incluso tiene un hijo de 14 años y busca que este siga sus mismos pasos administrando el deposito, pero con la gran ventaja que hará todo lo posible para que estudie y busque un mejor trabajo, y si eso significa que después de un tiempo el negocio familiar desaparezca para Milton es más importante el progreso y futuro de su hijo.
Solicita un crédito para comprar insumos como clavos, surtido en tornillos, pinturas, alicates, cemento etc.
texts.en:
Milton is a smiling and happy worker who runs a shop which he inherited from his family because, in his youth and childhood, he went frequently with his father and learned everything about this business.

Milton is now definitely a man, and even has a 14-year-old son and wants him to continue in his same steps to run the shop, but with the great advantage that he will do everything possible for him to study and look for a better job. If this means that after a while, the family business will disappear, for Milton progress and his son's future are more important.

He asks for a loan to purchase supplies such as nails, a variety of screws, paints, pliers, cement, etc.

loans.use: to purchase tools and supplies such as nails, screws, paint, pliers, hammers, looking to improve his sales to provide his son with an education.

loans.name: Nelson De Jesús

texts.es:
Mejorar sus ventas, aumentar sus clientes, ser más competitivo en el mercado, mejorar su calidad de vida son las razones que llevaron a  Nelson a solicitar un apoyo económico pues su profesión de zapatero corre riesgo al no tener capital de trabajo pues muchos clientes van y hacen reparar su calzado y nunca vuelven. 
Por tal razón este trabajador hombre que prácticamente ha trabajo en ese local toda su vida pide su apoyo para mantener en pie aquello que es tan preciado para y que no solo tiene un valor sentimental si no que significa su única entrada de dinero.
Solicita un crédito para la compra de insumos como suelas, pegantes, tacones, y demás artículos para la reparación de calzado.
texts.en:
To improve his sales, increase his customer base, be more competitive in the market, and improve his quality of life are the reasons that brought Nelson to ask for economic support since his profession of cobbler runs the risk that if he doesn't have working capital many customers go and have them repair their shoes, and never come back.

For this reason, this hard-working man who has worked practically his whole life asks for your support to keep standing that which is so valuable for him and that doesn't only have a sentimental value but also is his only source of income.

He asks for a loan to purchase supplies such as soles, adhesives, heels, and other things to repair shoes.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to repair footwear, such as soles, adhesives, heels, etc.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 39 years old, married, and together with his spouse, he has been blessed with six children. 

He has been selling cereals for seven years and it has been profitable. He makes a monthly income of KES 9,000. 

He plans to use this loan to buy more stock of maize and beans to sell. He will use the anticipated profits to buy a plot of land and expand his business by buying more cereals to sell. This is his first loan term from VisionFund Kenya.

His future hope is to educate his children.

loans.use: To buy more stock of cereals.

loans.name: Marufat

texts.en:
Marufat was born in 1979. She lives in a small village of the North Tajikistan with her husband and two children. Now, her husband is in Russia and he is a worker.
 
The main source of income for the family is from agricultural activities. She has been busy with animal husbandry. Marufat feeds sheep. She has worked in this field more than six years. It is hardly enough to provide food for the family.

She wants to buy coal and wood for winter season. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy coal and wood for winter season.

loans.name: Javier Antonio

texts.es:
Javier un hombre que quedo desempleado, es responsable por el cuidado de su pareja y sus 4 hijos de 14, 17, 5 y 7 años de edad, pero como hombre del hogar nos e quedo a esperar que le llovieran ideas y  oportunidades de empleo, el mismo ante la dificultad decide iniciar su propio negocio y es por esta razón que se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el propósito de comprar una mesa de billar e iniciar como emprendedor.
El crédito le urge de urgencia pues cada día que pasa es una entrada menso de dinero a su necesitado hogar.
Su meta es poder levantarse de esta situación y ofrecerle a su familia una buena calidad y prosperar como empresa.
texts.en:
Javier is a man who found himself unemployed. He is responsible for the care of his partner and their 4 children, ages 14, 17, 5, and 6 years old, but as a family man, he didn't wait for ideas and work opportunities to rain on him. In the face of this difficulty, he decided to start his own business and for this reason he finds himself asking for a loan with the purpose of purchasing a pool table and starting as an entrepreneur.  

The loan is urgent because with every day that passes, less money enters into his poor home.

His goal is to be able to lift himself out of this situation and offer his family a good quality and to prosper as a business.

loans.use: to purchase a pool table and start his live as an entrepreneur to sustain his partner and 4 minor children.

loans.name: Maria Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba una guerrera, luchadora, madre cabeza de familia, sus 5 hijos y su situación actual hacen que esta mujer sea de admirar, paso por una gran dificultad que fue perder a su esposo pero no fue ningún impedimento para dejar que su hogar se cayera.
Hoy viene a ustedes a solicitar un apoyo para terminar la construcción de un invernadero para las plantaciones de flores y junto con su familia consolidar un negocio familiar. 
Rosalba al perder su esposo no solo se quedó sin un ser amado, sin maestro, sin apoyo económico, y bueno solo quiere demostrar a sus hijos firmeza y trabajar en post de ellos.
Con el crédito terminara la construcción de su invernadero y podrá producir prontamente
texts.en:
Rosalba is a warrior, a fighter, the head of her family; her 5 children and their current situation make this woman admirable. She went through a very difficult time which was losing her husband, but it wasn't an impediment that caused her household to fall apart. 

Today, she comes to you to ask for a loan to complete the construction of a nursery for her flower plantation and, with her family, and establish the family business.

When Rosabla lost her husband, she not only was left without a loved one, but also without a teacher, without economic support, and she only wants to show her children strength and work in pursuit of them. 

With this loan, she will finish the construction of her nursery and will be able to produce soon.

loans.use: to finish building a nursery for her flower farm and to begin the work rapidly.

loans.name: Inocencio

texts.es:
Inocencio es un hombre del campo, todo un campesino con sus buenas tradiciones y costumbres, un hombre que le saca gusto al trabajo de esas personas que no se puede quedar quieto en ningún momento que bsuca producir y producir.
Inocencio aprendió todo sobre la agricultura y cuidado de cerdos gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre y hoy a sus 68 es padre soltero con un hijo de 10 años a su cuidado.
Su meta es enseñarle todos sus conocimientos a su hijo para que este quede con el negocio y sepa administrarlo.
Este sonriente hombre solicita un crédito para la compra de cerdos y semillas pues quiere cultivar nuevos productos, quiere hacer prosperar su finca y prepararse para épocas difíciles donde el dinero escasea.
Para Inocencio este apoyo será muy importante, ya que será la primera ayuda que reciba a sus 68 años, los años pesan pero él seguirá trabajando para dejarle a su hijo una buena herencia.
texts.en:
Inocencio is a man of the countryside, a rural person with his good traditions and customs, a man to who gets his joy from work, one of these people who can't ever remain quiet, who produces and produces. 

Inocencio learned everything about agriculture and the care of pigs thanks to his father's instruction, and today at age 68 he is a single father with a 10-year-old son in his care. 

His goal is to teach all of his knowledge to his son so that he is left with the business and knows how to manage it. 

This smiling man asks for a loan to purchase pigs and seeds because he wants to grow new crops; he wants his farm to prosper and prepare himself for difficult times when money gets scarce. 

For Inocencio, this support will be very important, since it will be the first loan that he has gotten in his 68 years. The years are heavy, but he will continue working to give his son a good inheritance.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and seeds to grow new crops, looking to leave a good inheritance for his son.

loans.name: Nhóm 11- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mãi works in agriculture raising poultry. Mãi has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. 

Mãi is 57 years old, and she is married with five children.

Mãi is the group leader of the Nhóm 11- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên solidarity group, which consists of nine members. 

In 2010, Mãi joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

The main hardship that Mãi faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Mãi hopes for her business to do well, to maintain  a successful business, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry

loans.name: Nhóm 12- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên Group

texts.en:
Cúc works in agriculture, raising cows. Cúc has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. She is applying for a loan to purchase a baby cow to raise and sell in the future.

Cúc is 54 years old, and she is married with five children. She is the leader of a three member group, the Nhóm 12- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên solidarity group. 

In 2010, Cúc joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid four loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Cúc hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase a baby cow

loans.name: 020105230001Thôn Xuân Phụ Hoằng Phụ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Khóe works in agriculture raising poultry. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Khóe is 54 years old and she is married with five children. Khóe is the group leader of the 020105230001thôn Xuân Phụ Hoằng Phụ solidarity group, which consists of four members. Khóe lives in Hoang Hoa district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Khóe's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. Khóe has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Khóe faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khóe hopes for her business to do well, to maintain a successful business, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
Carlos un hombre de 28 años de edad, que desde muy joven le toco el trabajo de la construcción, un empleo muy difícil y mal pago y por estas dos razones decidió aprender y adquirir todos los conocimientos para ser maestro de obra.
Es un hombre muy pulido en sus trabajos, cobra justamente pero la falta de herramienta lo ha limitado para tomar trabajos más importantes y grandes es por tal razón que solicita un crédito para comprar maquinaria y herramienta de mano.
Ayuden a este hombre a progresar a pasar de ser un obrero a un maestro de obra tiene con qué  pero necesita un pequeño empuje para sacar todo su talento a flote.
texts.en:
Carlos is a 28-year-old man, who from very young has worked in construction, a very difficult and poorly-paid field, and for these two reasons he decided to learn and acquire all the knowledge to become a master builder.

He is a man who is very refined in his work, he charges honestly, but his lack of tools has limited him from taking more important and larger jobs; it is for this reason that he asks for a loan to purchase machinery and hand tools. 

Help this man to progress and go from being a laborer to a master builder. He has the knowledge but needs a small boost to get all his talent up and running.

loans.use: to purchase machinery and hand tools.

loans.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Viviana es una empresaria ambiciosa muy guiada por su nobleza y sus ganas de ser una empresaria.
Gracias a su madre y a ella misma aprendió todo de las confecciones y desde el año 2006 monto su propio taller de confección que aunque no ha crecido mucho ha logrado mantenerse durante estos 8 años de operación y no solo eso alimentar su hijo de 5 años que nació a través del recorrido de la empresa.
Viviana aunque muy sonriente y segura en sus acciones, busca la manera de salir adelante y aunque es temerosa para invertir, solicitara un crédito para la compra de insumos para fabricar sus propias prendas, con diseños novedosos.
Este crédito le permitirá mejorar sus ingresos y los diseños que tiene pensados son un éxito podrá tener un volumen de trabajo constante para todo el año y más importante es que pagara la matrícula de escolaridad primaria de su hijo.
texts.en:
Viviana is an ambitious and noble business woman who is very driven by how much she wants to be a businesswoman.

Thanks to her mother and herself, she learnt all there is to know about dressmaking and in 2006 she set up her own dressmaking workshop. Although her business has not grown much, she has managed to maintain operations for 8 years and also feed her 5 year-old son. 

Although Viviana is happy and sure of her actions, she is looking for a way to move forward and although she is frightened to invest, she is asking for a loan to purchase supplies to make her own clothing with new designs. 

This loan will allow her to improve her income and if the designs she has in mind are a success, she will have a constant flow of work for the whole year and, more importantly, she will be able to pay her son's primary school fees.

loans.use: to purchase supplies to make her own clothing, taking advantage of the December season.

loans.name: Jose Leonardo

texts.es:
José un sonriente, gozador de su profesión, dedicado a las confecciones, padre de 2 hijos menores de edad que inicio su negocio pro necesidad económica y que aprendió empíricamente trabajando en empresas similares y que hoy viene  a solicitar un crédito para la compra de telas, el secreto de la felicidad de José radica en la música una buena canción alegra una tarde ardua de trabajo. 
Espera sacar su negocio adelante y poder apoyar en la matrícula de los estudios de su hijo y poder darle un cambio a su casa estéticamente.
texts.en:
José is a smiling man; he enjoys his profession and works making clothing. He is the father of two minor children who began his business out of economic necessity and who learned on the job, working in similar businesses, and who today comes to ask for a loan to purchase fabric. The secret to José's happiness has its roots in music - a good song makes an afternoon of arduous work happy. 

He hopes to get his business ahead and to be able to support his son's matriculation costs and to be able to make an aesthetic change to his house.

loans.use: to purchase fabric.

loans.name: Malika

texts.en:
Malika is a married mother. She is a very enterprising woman. She constantly struggles to raise her son, who is the center of her life. For more than five years, she has worked as a teacher in a local school. Her honesty, responsibility, and punctuality have been the reasons for her job promotion, and she believes she is doing well because she always gives the best of herself. 

Malika is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because with their support she will be able to make improvements to her house, such as repairing the roof of her house. In this way, she and her family will have a better quality of life. 

She is asking for a loan to buy slate. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy slate to repair the roof of her house

loans.name: Nhóm 17- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà works in agriculture growing vegetables. She has been involved in this business for eight years. The main hardship that Hà faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetable seedlings to grow and sell in the future.

Hà is 32 years old, and she is married with two children. Hà is the group leader of the Nhóm 17- Thôn  Yên Trường-Đông Yên solidarity group, which consists of eight members. 

In 2010, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

In the future, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, to maintain a successful business, and to make enough money to provide for her kids.

loans.use: to purchase vegetable seedlings

loans.name: 020404310001 Hải Sơn _ Hoằng Trường Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Thay has a retail business selling scrap. Thay has been involved in this business for five years. The main hardship that Thay faces in her business is the lack of capital.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more scrap to sell.

Thay is 55 years old, and she is married with five children. She lives and works in Hoang Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 020404310001 Hải Sơn _ Hoằng Trường solidarity group. 

In 2013, Thay joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. Thay has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

With her business profit, Thay hopes for her business to do well, to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business, and to maintain  a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more scrap

loans.name: Nora Cecilia

texts.es:
Nora es la dueña de un negocio de venta de mercancía y accesorios para mujer un verdadero paraíso para aquellas mujeres que les gusta usar accesorios de toda clase.
Inicio su negocio como una necesidad de ingreso de dinero pues se separó de su esposo quedando a cargo de tres hijos adolescentes que Vivian y dependían de ella.
Su propósito con el negocio es tener una buena calidad de vida y esta inteligente mujer quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de surtido en juguetería para la temporada de diciembre.
El crédito ayudara a anticiparse a la temporada de diciembre.
texts.en:
Nora is the owner of a business selling merchandise and ladies' accessories, a real paradise for those women who like to use all sorts of accessories. 

She began her business as a need to have income since she separated from her husband, leaving her responsible for three adolescent children who lived with and depended on her. 

Her goal with the business is to have a good quality of life and this intelligent woman wants to ask for a loan to purchase a variety of toys for the December season.

The loan will help her to be ready for the December season.

loans.use: to purchase a supply of toys for the December season.

loans.name: Tatiana Sirley

texts.es:
Tatiana es una bella joven de 21 años de edad que a través de su tienda busca una manera de pagarse sus estudios universitarios.
Inicio el negocio por una gran necesidad económica pero con el pasar del tiempo fue acentuando su empresa e ir produciendo lo suficiente para estudiar, es un sacrificio grande que tendrá sus frutos después.
Tatiana busca una ayuda para mejorar sus ingresos, invirtiendo en nuevo productos y variedad de marca de los que actualmente tiene por tal razón solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido en grano, lácteos, y refrescos buscando mejorar sus ventas y atraer más clientes.
texts.en:
Tatiana is a lovely young woman, 21 years old, who, through her business, seeks a way to pay for her university studies.

She began her business from a great economic need, but with the passing of time, she accentuated her business and it produced enough for her studies; it is a big sacrifice that will bear its fruits later.

Tatiana looks for support to increase her income, investing in new products and varieties of brands than the ones she currently carries. For this reason, she asks for a loan to purchase a variety of grains, dairy products and soft drinks looking to improve her sales and attract more customers.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of grains, dairy products, and soft drinks, looking to improve her sales to pay her university costs.

loans.name: Diana Sorely

texts.es:
Diana es una hermosa mujer de 25 años emprendedora, trabajadora, juiciosa, responsable que se trazó una meta la cual es la compra de una vivienda.
Su entrada de dinero radica en la venta de productos de la marca Amway, con surtido de productos para el uso doméstico y es esta la razón que la lleva a solicitar un crédito para comprar mercancía de esta marca su idea es tener surtido para antojar a amas de casa y variedad de público de que esta marca es mucho mejor, expandir su idea de negocio a barrios, pueblos y toda aquella persona que quiera abrirle las puertas.
texts.en:
Diana is a lovely 25-year-old woman, an entrepreneur, hard-worker, sensible, and responsible who set herself a goal which is to buy a house.
 
Her source of income comes from selling Amway products with a stock of supplies for household use, and this is the reason that brings her to ask for a loan to purchase this brand's merchandise. Her plan is to have a stock to appeal to housewives and a variety of the general public, that this brand is much better, to expand her business idea in the neighborhoods, towns and to every person who wants to open doors for her.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of products for household use, spreading her business idea in neighborhoods, sidewalks and to every person who opens a door for her; she is a very persevering woman.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad, 48, is married and the father of six children. He is also a Palestinian refugee who started working in the construction field 32 years ago, specializing in tiles, to cover the needs and expenses of his family.

Today, Mohammad is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner Al Majmoua to develop his business. With this loan, he will buy necessary construction tools, which will facilitate his work and provide his customers with better and quick service. 

He hopes to expand his business more in the future to increase his income and improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy necessary construction tools

loans.name: Edinson José

texts.es: Edinson de 48 años de edad, es padre de dos hijos de 20 y 17 años; él se dedica a la compra y venta de materiales reciclables desde el año 1992, después de aprender de su tío, propietario del negocio,  quien posteriormente se lo vendió. En su negocio compra y vende cartón, plásticos y metales, directamente a empresas de Barranquilla,  quienes son sus principales clientes  que le compran todo el material reciclable. Sus ventas las realiza de contado y a crédito, todas las semanas de 8 a 6 de la tarde y compra a recicladores individuales, que recuperan casa a casa, negocio a negocio, en toda la ciudad.   En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará cartón, plástico y metales en un mayor volumen. Con su credikiva su negocio tendrá un efectivo disponible para aumentar su capacidad de compra, pues tiene más capital de trabajo. Su meta amas adelante es duplicar sus compras el próximo año, y más adelante comprar un vehículo para transportar los elementos reciclables a las empresas. Igualmente sueña con lograr plena fidelización de su clientela agregando un buen servicio y buenos precios, lo cual es positivo para su negocio.
texts.en:
Edinson, 48 years old, is the father of two children, ages 20 and 17.  He has worked buying and selling recyclable materials since 1992, after learning from his uncle, the owner of the business, who later sold it to him. In his business, he buys and sells cardboard, plastics, and metals directly from businesses in Barranquilla, who are his primary customers who purchase all of his recyclable materials. He makes his sales in cash and credit, all week long, from 8 to 6 in the afternoon, and purchases from individual recyclers, who gather from house to house, business to business, in the whole city. 

Currently, he is applying for a Kiva loan, his first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which he will purchase cardboard, plastic and metal in a larger volume. With the Kiva loan, his business will have the available cash to increase his capacity for purchases, since he will have more working capital. 

His goal for the future is to double his purchases in the next year, and after that to purchase a vehicle to transport the recyclable materials to the businesses. Equally, he dreams of being able to achieve full loyalty of his customer base, adding good service and good prices, which is positive for his business.

loans.use: to purchase cardboard, plastic and metal.

loans.name: Marianita De Jesus

texts.es:
Marianita es una persona humilde que vive en Ventanas provincia de los Rios tiene 61 años de edad vive con sus dos hijos, ella es una persona ya de edad y no puede hacer muchos esfuerzos por eso vive con sus hijos para que le ayuden en su trabajo de la agricultura, se dedica a la siembra de maíz para luego sembrar y obtener una buena producción para así solventar sus gastos. realiza las compras en Ventanas cada cada semana su sueño es comprarse un carro para salir a vender su produccion. 
En su tiempo libre le gusta ver la televisión y arreglar la casa.
texts.en:
Marianita is a humble person who lives in Ventanas, in Los Rios province. She is 61 years old and lives with her two children. She is now an older person and can't work very hard, so she lives with her children so they help her with her agricultural work. She works cultivating corn to later plant and get a good production to pay her expenses. She does her shopping in Ventanas weekly. Her dream is to buy herself a car to be go out to sell her products. 

In her free time, she likes to watch television and repair the house.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural products.

loans.name: Avelina Andrea

texts.es: Avelina, desde muy niña ayudaba en el restaurante de su cuñada,  allí en este neegocio fue empleada y  adquirió una gran experiencia, que años mas tarde le permitió iniciar su propio negocio.  Con sus ahorros compró toda la infraestructura para su funcionamiento, y hoy  esta ubicado en  la casa de su madre desde el año 2004.  Sus principales clientes son sus vecinos, operarios de empresas, obreros y transeúntes,  a quienes les brinda facilidad de pago.  Sus compras son de contado en graneros y en el centro de la ciudad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual comprarár víveres como arroz, aceite, carne y utensilios de cocina, de los cuales recibe descuento de sus proveedores por comprar al por mayor. Avelina tiene 47 años de edad y 1 hijo de 12 años y 3 hijas de 20, 15 y 10, y sus meta familiar es continuara brindándole una educación a sus hijos, por eso anhela a largo plazo ampliar su negocio, ella considera que puede lograr sus propósitos trabajando con mucho esfuerzo.
texts.en: Avelina, has helped in her sister-in-law's restaurant since she was very young. She was an employee in that restaurant and acquired a lot of experience, which years later allowed her to open her own business. With her savings, she bought all the infrastructure to run it, and today it is located in her mother's  house, since 2004. Her primary customers are her neighbors, business workers, laborers, and passers-by, to whom she offers ease of payment. She makes her purchases in cash at granaries in the city center. Currently, she is applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan that she has had through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will purchase supplies such as rice, oil, meat, and kitchen utensils, for which she gets a discount from her providers because she buys in bulk. Avelina is 47 years old and has 1 son, age 12, and 3 daughters, ages 20, 15, and 10. Her family goal is to continue offering her children education, so she desires in the long term to expand her business. She believes that she can achieve her goals working with a lot of effort.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as rice, oil, meat and cooking utensils.

loans.name: Mejorando La Economia Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mejorando la Economia está en su ciclo número 6 º  del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde gracias al trabajo en conjunto de todas están mejorando su situación de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Gumersinda quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel tres, lo que quiere decir que ha mejorado bastante, todo esto gracias a su esfuerzo y su sacrificio diario. Ella tiene una peluquería, que poco a poco fue equipando, y gracias a esto da a su familia todo lo que necesitan para que no pasen por ningún tipo de necesidades.
La Sra. Gumersinda Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de  insumos   para  su negocio, como ser tintes, cremas, peines, tijeras, shampoo, enjuagues y demás, de manera a poder seguir dando a sus clientes un buen servicio.
texts.en:
The group called Mejorando la Economia is in its 6th loan cycle in the women's committee program, where they all work and help each other to get ahead. They are completing the poverty elimination questionnaire, where thanks to their everyone's group effort, they are improving their life situations.

One of the members is Gumersinda who, in the last questionnaire, indicated a poverty level of level 3, which means that it has improved quite a bit, everything is thanks to her efforts and her daily sacrifices. She has a beauty salon, which she equipped bit by bit and, thanks to this, she gives her family everything they need so that they don't lack for any necessities.

Gumersinda asks for this loan to purchase supplies for her business such as dyes, creams, combs, scissors, shampoo, rinses, and others, to be able to continue providing her customers with a good service.

loans.use: to purchase dyes, creams, combs, scissors, shampoo, rinses and other supplies.

loans.name: Rukia

texts.en:
Rukia is widowed with five children who don't attend school because they are all adults. She owns a house that has no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food.

She has operated a charcoal selling business for the past 15 years. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in this business.

Rukia has decided to join Yehu to expand her business. With a loan of 40,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of charcoal for resale

loans.name: Mustafa

texts.en:
Mustafa, 25, is a single man from Tulkarem City in Palestine. He makes Arabic sweets in his store in the city.

His store has been opened for the past four years. He has good experience, and his sweets are very famous in Tulkarem and outside the city. This photo was taken when he was working.

Mustafa would like to improve his business and expand it in the future. He has taken out a loan in US dollars with Palestine for Credit and Development. This loan will help him buy raw materials for his sweets store. 

By taking out this loan, Mustafa will be able to increase his production, especially in the winter, because the demand is higher then.

loans.use: to buy raw material for his sweets store.

loans.name: María Angélica

texts.es: María tiene 22 años de edad y esta dedica desde el año 2011 a presta los servicios de corte de cabello, tintes, blower, masajes y todo tipo de tratamientos para el cuidado del cabello en su salón de belleza, ella trabaja con su cónyuge puesto que el negocio inicialmente era de él.  Este negocio es el sostenimiento de su hogar y funciona de 9 a.m. a 9 p.m. todos los días. Sus principales clientes son sus vecinos y conocidos quienes se encuentran fidelizados por la calidad en la prestación de los servicios a los que acceden.  en la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo mediante el cual invertirá en la compra enseres para adecuar su negocio, silla, televisor y maquina para cortar cabello.  Esta inversión repercutirá positivamente al ampliar  la cobertura  y agilidad del servicio, con ello proveerá mayores expectativas de ingresos a su familia.
